title: cooked' spring soup
description: Once the prep is done this dish will take very little time and its fresh flavours are certain to impress.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a pressure cooker.
ingredients: 250g/9oz butter (unsalted or salted depending on your preference), cubed
1 litre/1¾ pints good-quality chicken or vegetable stock
3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, plus extra to serve
300g/10½oz smoked streaky bacon or pancetta, chopped
2 sticks celery, peeled and chopped into 1cm/½in cubes
100g/3½oz dried spaghetti, broken into bite-sized pieces
4 ripe plum tomatoes on the vine
6 asparagus spears, woody ends removed, peeled
½ bunch radishes, cut into quarters
